title: Take a Stand Against Coronavirus Hysteria (Ep 1202)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest key takeaways from the coronavirus outbreak. I also address the hysterical, ridiculous media coverage of the issue. Finally, I address the latest explosive revelations in the Spygate case, which are damning for the plotters. 

News Picks:


President Trump announces bold new measures to fight the coronavirus outbreak.

Coronavirus myths debunked.


Italy is suffering as the Coronavirus spreads.


A doctor explains what you need to know about the Wuhan virus. 

Some strong suggestions about the response to the Wuhan virus.  

The Trump administration’s “remain in Mexico” immigration asylum policy is allowed to proceed. 

The Russian misinformation continues. Shameful.

The FBI’s case against the Trump team fell apart in the first months of his presidency.


An older article about Finland’s expensive healthcare system which is worth your time.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
